description:
P

After years of providing her clients with instantaneous beauty, Jane B. has decided to share her coveted technique with you. Imagine elevating your beauty skills and techniques up to an explosive level by providing your clients, friends and family with a seamless application of luscious lashes that will be undetectable to even the most critical eye. Learn and perfect this technique that will keep you ahead of the competition.

In this course, you will learn from Master Lashologist and Beauty Educator, Jane B., her "...They Look So Natural" technique of applying seamless and flawless individual eyelashes.

Does This Sound Familiar?

"...I would love to put on makeup, but I don't have a clue"

"...I don't want to wake up earlier than I have to"

"...I'm scared that I will look like a clown"

Once you have perfected my individual eyelash application, the learning continues with my "Fast & Fabulous, Apply Flawless Makeup in 5, 10 or 15 minutes" Course. Never have these excuses again for not looking your best, I have the remedy. All you will need is 5, 10 or 15 extra minutes in your routine to look refined and polished. However, you don't have to stop here, use these core basic concepts to create a variety of sensational looks tailor made just for you.!

Imagination is now a reality!

Beauty Professionals:

  • Are you ready to elevate and expand your business?
  • Increase the value of your services?
  • Put yourself in demand?
  • Enjoy repeat clientele?

Non-Beauty Professionals:

  • Are you ready to learn how to instantaneously glamorize YOUR look "On Demand"?
  • Are you ready to earn extra cash by providing a fun and flirty service to family and friends?

This course is designed to give you an advantage by providing you with the Why's as well as they How's for your lash and makeup applications. This course includes comprehensive Video Demonstrations, Lectures by Jane B., and Instructor Feed back.

In these courses you will also learn:

  • Tools of the Trade
  • Comprehensive Eyelash Theory
  • Custom Eyelash Design
  • Proper Placement
  • Safe and Irritation Free Application
  • Lash Lost Prevention
  • Client Care and Maintenance
  • Tips to Build your Eyelash Business
  • Skin Preparation
  • Concealing Problem Areas
  • Pressed Powder
  • Eyebrow Sculpting
  • Eyeshadow Placement & Blending
  • Eyeliner & Mascara
  • Blush
  • Lushes Lips

You will also learn to apply lashes for maximum staying power and for comfort. This application technique is safe for the contact wearer and will not affect your natural eyelashes.

You will receive the same "Hands-on" training in the same sequence of a hands-on practice session used in the live workshops.

Learn to apply flawless eyelashes and makeup at your own pace, on your own in time in the comfort of your home or office.

The beauty of these courses is that their simplistic layouts makes it easy to comprehend from the novice to the advanced.

“…Jane B.’s Individual Eyelash class is so amazing. Her teaching style is very thorough, and nurturing. The class breaks down the application of lashes to it’s very basic level. The mystery is revealed. This Class is the truth.”

- Nefer Nekhet – Natural Hair Stylist

"...Thank you so much for "Fast & Fabulous",I look great every morning in 5 minutes!"

- K. Adams, Working Mom

.
title: Lashology: Mastering Individual Eyelash Application
